headline: FRONTEND DEVELOPER
intro_text: Hi there, I am a frontend developer based in LÃ¼denscheid. After working as a robot programmer for several years, I decided to turn my hobby, frontend development, into a profession.
about_text1: I am passionate about creating complex web applications that are not only functional, but also provide an intuitive user experience and make the most of the latest technologies.
about_text2: Pushing myself to take on new challenges gives me the drive to learn more and become more knowledgeable.
skills_text: I have experience in building projects with various frontend technologies and concepts.
portfolio_text: Explore a selection of my work - please feel free to interact with them to get insights of my skills.
join_desc: Task manager inspired by the Kanban System. Create and organize task using drag and drop functions, assign users and categories. This project was developed by group work.
dabubble_desc: A Slack clone with various functions such as: Login, real-time chat, file uploads, channel creation and changing user data. The backend of this project is firebase
halloween_desc: A simple Jump-and-Run game based on an object-oriented approach. Help Maddy to find coins and arcane orbs to fight against the zombies !
contact_text2: Contact me through this form, I am interested in hearing from you, knowing your ideas and contributing to your projects with my work.
check_text3: and agree to the processing of my data as outlined.
